meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a tomato.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a tomatoey color.
meanings.sent2: The pizza sauce was so tomatoey and delicious.
meanings.sent3: She wore a tomatoey red dress to the party.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky a tomatoey hue.
meanings.sent5: The garden smelled of fresh, tomatoey plants.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or flavor of tomatoes.
meanings.sent1: The pasta sauce was too tomatoey for my liking.
meanings.sent2: The salad dressing was light and tomatoey.
meanings.sent3: He made a tomatoey smoothie as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The air in the kitchen was filled with a tomatoey aroma.
meanings.sent5: The sandwich was bursting with juicy, tomatoey slices.
